frame.name: Impact
frame.definition: <def-root>While in motion, an <fen>Impactor</fen> makes sudden, forcible contact with the <fen>Impactee</fen>, or two <fen>Impactors</fen> both move, mutually making forcible contact. <ex><fex name="Impactor">The massive metal foot</fex> <t>hit</t> <fex name="Impactee">the ground</fex> <fex name="Result">with a huge thud</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason for which an Impact occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Impactor
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that hits the <fen>Impactee</fen>. <ex><fex name="Imp1">The rock</fex> <t>hit</t> the sand with a thump.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Impactee
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity which is hit by the <fen>Impactor</fen>. <ex>The rock <t>hit</t> <fex name="Imp2">the sand</fex> with a thump.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Impactors
FE.definition: <def-root>The multiple entities that collide. <ex><fex name="Imps">The car and truck</fex> <t>collided</t> at a combined speed of over 100MPH.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Speed
FE.definition: <def-root>The speed at impact. <ex>The wrecking ball <t>struck</t> <fex name="Speed">at 330 mph</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Subregion</fen> identifies the affected part of the larger whole. <ex>The sparks <t>hit</t> the paper <fex name="Sub_R">right on the edge</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Force
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of force in the course of the impact. <t></t></def-root>

FE.name: Period_of_iterations
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> throughout which the impact repeatedly takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Impactors</fen> or the <fen>Impactor</fen> during the impact.</def-root>
